meanings.definition: A piquant sauce typically made with mayonnaise, mustard, capers, and herbs.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious salad with a drizzle of ravigotte.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the tangy flavor of ravigotte on my sandwich.
meanings.sent3: The ravigotte sauce danced on my taste buds, making the dish exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking secret was adding a touch of ravigotte, elevating the entire meal.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the ravigotte sauce made the dish look appetizing.

meanings.definition: To dress or garnish with ravigotte sauce.
meanings.sent1: She decided to ravigotte the salad before serving it to the guests.
meanings.sent2: The chef will ravigotte the dish with a special sauce for extra flavor.
meanings.sent3: He ravigotted the plate with such finesse that it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The room filled with the aroma of the dish he was ravigotting in the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: With a swift hand, she ravigotted the main course, adding a burst of taste.
